name: Darples' Confusion Simulator
description:
You are dead.

You were an 8/8 maxed Warrior in the Realm of Oryx, the Mad God. You were afflicted with a confusion debuff, and you unintentionally walked straight into  Oryx 2 and died instantly.  You now find yourself trapped in a hellish chasm where you will spend all eternity picking up rocks and attempting to avoid walking straight into lava.

While running towards these rocks you may become afflicted with the dreaded confusion debuff that ended your life previously, this will cause your normal WASD (Up, Left, Down, Right) controls to change to DSAW (Up, Left, Down, Right). If you do not stop moving or react quickly enough, you will run into the lava and die. Again.

But hey, who makes the same mistake twice?

TECHNICAL

===========

If you can not open ZIP files, then place the data.win and the game.exe in a folder together and run the EXE.

Otherwise, download the ZIP normally! :)

You can press "R" to restart the game forcefully.
